name: Pet Growing Zombie
description:
Help your pet zombie grow and recover her past memories. Find out her dark past.

Virtual pet game made for Pet GameJam 2022.  Started late and I didnt have time to put the ending. Hopefully I can add more content soon!

Future plans:

  1. Change growth bar shape to a circle and add image effects
  2. Add pictures for the cutscenes
  3. 1 new evolution
  4. Add happiness and unlockables
  5. Finish the ending story
  6. Auto save and load only on PC build (Done!)

• Project Lead/Artist/Designer: PixiTales

• Programming: Mr. Scientist

• Story: Hag

• House Music: Neo2Cold 

• Additional Music: Neo2Cold

           •  Gothic Sound by bariq18

          •  Gothic Horror Symphonic Waltz by ISAo
